source.8533f64c:
fig, ax = plt.subplots(1,2,figsize=(15,5))
df1['Country'].value_counts().head(10).plot(kind='bar', title='TOP 10 Boat Country Location', ax=ax[0])
df1['City'].value_counts().head(10).plot(kind='bar', title='TOP 10 Boat City Location', ax=ax[1])
plt.show()
source.88aaf1a8:
fig, ax = plt.subplots(1,2,figsize=(15,5))
df1.groupby('Material')['EUR_price'].mean().sort_values(ascending=False).head(10).plot(kind='bar',title='TOP 10 Most Expensive Material Type', ax=ax[0])
df1.groupby('Boat Type')['EUR_price'].mean().sort_values(ascending=False).head(10).plot(kind='bar',title='TOP 10 Most Expensive Boat Type',ax=ax[1])
plt.ylabel('Price')
plt.show()
source.cc05a7c6:
df1.groupby(['Country','City'])['EUR_price'].mean().sort_values(ascending=False).head(10).plot(kind='bar', title='Place Where Expensive Boats Dock')
plt.ylabel('Price')
plt.show()
source.a3bcc0f4:
df1.groupby(['City','Boat Type'])['Number of views last 7 days'].sum().sort_values(ascending=False).head(10).plot(kind='bar',title='TOP 10 Most Popular Location & Boat Type')
plt.ylabel('Number of views last 7 days')
plt.show()
